name: Green Belt - Moral Maze
description: This debate is about the housing crisis, home ownership in the UK and the deregulation of the planning laws and building on the greenbelt.

name: Hypocrisy - Moral Maze
description: This debate discusses how personal moral boundaries are often quite flexible for one's own shortcomings, yet there are often tendencies to pass stricter judgments on others.

name: Syria - Moral Maze
description: This debate discusses to what degree international governments and institutions should get involved with in the uprising in Syria.

name: Problem Families - Moral Maze
description: This debate discusses so called problem families and the problems they pose to society, as well as how the government can & should interfere with troubled families and the issues the Troubled Families Unit is facing.
